plot: A classic story of Rebirth, set against the backdrop of contemporary Belfast. When widowed police officer, Michael, apprehends two youths breaking into a car it leads to an event that turns his life around.
title: Grand Mal
plot_es: A classic story of Rebirth, set against the backdrop of contemporary Belfast. When widowed police officer, Michael, apprehends two youths breaking into a car it leads to an event that turns his life around.
